feature.name: Adaptive Power Adjustment for EIRP Limit
feature.summary: This feature enables adaptive power backoff on the PDSCH to keep the instantaneous EIRP

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.configuredMaxTxPower
parameters.description: The feature only reduces power on PDSCH. Therefore, this                                     attribute must be configured to limit the EIRP of other downlink                                     channels. Also, even with the feature, it is recommended to set                                     this attribute so that the EIRP of the weakest channel is                                     restricted without needing to reduce power automatically.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012491 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012491 MO instance.
